participant_2.background:
I would be a seamstress who can sew with my magic hands and never have to worry about knee pain again.
I am single and enjoy my freedom to pursue my hobbies like fishing.
my eyes are green.
I take a selfie in my bathroom mirror before I go to school.
my favorite mortal combat character is milena.

content.text: I'm doing good! I'm on my way to school right now.
Oh fun! What are you studying?
I'm studying to be a seamstress.
That's awesome! I've always been interested in sewing.
It's a lot of fun! I love being able to create things with my own hands.
Do you have any favorite sewing projects?
I love making clothes for myself and my friends. I also love making costumes for Halloween.
That's awesome! I'm sure your friends love your handmade clothes.
They do! I'm always happy to make them something new.
What do you like to do for fun besides sewing?
I love to go fishing. I also like to play video games and watch movies.
I love to go fishing too! What's your favorite type of fish to catch?
I love to catch bass. They're so much fun to fight.
Me too! They're a great challenge.
